Sniper


  Sniper saw the two maximals coming out of the ark. "Hold on, I'm
one 
of you." He after all was a maximal. He didn't want to fight them, 
after all he was pretty Slag. He probally coudn't handle the weakest 
bot on this planet. "I am a maximal stop firing." Sniper had to do 
something. He couldn't handle the firing. "What the Slag is wrong
with 
you, I am a Maximal."
